Platform.Title: Escherichia coli whole-genome tiling array (2 x 105K)
Platform.Description: The Platform data table reflects a condensed representation of the array's replicate features. The full array layout representing all of the individual features is linked as a supplementary file at the foot of this record.

Sample.Title: HG228_vs_MG1655_rep1

Channel.Growth-Protocol: The cells are grown upto mid-log phase in minimal media plus 0.04% (w/v) glucose and 1.5% (v/v) ethanol.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA was extracted from each sample using Norgen's Total RNA purification kit (cat# 17200) per manufacturer's instructions.
Channel.Label: Cy3
Channel.Label-Protocol: RNA samples were poly adenylated for 30 min (NEB, cat# M0276L) and labeled using Agilent's quick-amp lebeling kit according to the manufacturer's protocol.

Channel.Organism: Escherichia coli str. K-12 substr. MG1655
Channel.Growth-Protocol: The cells are grown upto mid-log phase in minimal media plus 0.04% (w/v) glucose and 1.5% (v/v) ethanol.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA was extracted from each sample using Norgen's Total RNA purification kit (cat# 17200) per manufacturer's instructions.
Channel.Label: Cy5
Channel.Label-Protocol: RNA samples were poly adenylated for 30 min (NEB, cat# M0276L) and labeled using Agilent's quick-amp lebeling kit according to the manufacturer's protocol.

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: Samples were hybridized using gene-expression hybridization kit from Agilent. Hybridization was performed overnight for 18 hr in 65C.
Sample.Scan-Protocol: Agilent Technologies Scanner G2505B US22502626 was used to scan the slide.
Sample.Description: Ethanol tolerant and control cells are grown in minimal media plus 0.04% (w/v) glucose plus 1.5% (v/v) ethanol
Sample.Data-Processing: LOWESS normalized, condensed, background subtracted data obtained from processed Green signal/processed Red signal. Agilent Feature Extractionv 9.5 software was used.

Channel.Growth-Protocol: The cells are grown upto mid-log phase in minimal media plus 0.04% (w/v) glucose and 1.5% (v/v) ethanol.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA was extracted from each sample using Norgen's Total RNA purification kit (cat# 17200) per manufacturer's instructions.

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: Samples were hybridized using gene-expression hybridization kit from Agilent. Hybridization was performed overnight for 18 hr in 65C.
Sample.Scan-Protocol: Agilent Technologies Scanner G2505B US22502626 was used to scan the slide.
Sample.Description: Ethanol tolerant and control cells are grown in minimal media plus 0.04% (w/v) glucose plus 1.5% (v/v) ethanol
Sample.Data-Processing: LOWESS normalized, condensed, background subtracted data obtained from processed Green signal/processed Red signal. Agilent Feature Extractionv 9.5 software was used.

Series.Title: Gene expression profiling of the ethanol tolerant strain HG228 in comparison to its parental strain Escherichia coli MG1655
Series.Summary: The goal of this experiment is to identify the pathways that are deregulated as part of an adaptive response to high levels of ethanol in the media.
Series.Overall-Design: Ethanol tolerant cells (HG228) grown in minimal media plus 1.5% (v/v) ethanol were hybridized against E. coli MG1655 grown under similar conditions. The experiment was done in duplicates using biological replicates.
